newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka buys 100,000T wheat at $205.75 in tender.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka buys 100,000T wheat at $205.75 in tender.

text.p: Sri Lanka bought a total of 100,000 tonnges of wheat at 205.75 per tonne c and f for October delivery, government officials said on Friday.
The contract, comprising 50,000 tonnes each of hard and soft wheat, was awarded in a tender to trade firm Louis Dreyfus.
The wheat, to come from several countries, will be delivered in two shipments, the soft wheat in the first half of October and the hard wheat in the second half of the month, they said.
